author: abehazbunjr
title: Native Collections (CNFT Pinterest)
description: CNFT traders and businesses need to be able to host custom combinations of NFTs while protecting themselves from "wallet bombing".
solution: Create a simple visualizer that allows for storing custom collections as vanity URLs with a powerful regex search plus "and" logic.
experience: I am a full-time Plutus student with two years of Cardano experience and 14 years of web analytics and managing large technical projects.
